00053 class RootService : public Service
00054 {

00056 
00057         // The constructor
00058         RootService(const QString &hostname, int port, const QString &rootUrl);

00063         QString              getDeviceType() const;
00064

00066         ServiceParameters    getServiceById(const QString &serviceId) const;

00068         bool                 getServiceById(const QString &serviceId, const QString &deviceUdn, ServiceParameters &params) const;

00073 
00074         // Query the device for its service list
00075         void                 queryDevice();

00081 
00082
